note: Create these crons after gateway WS reconnects

payload.message:
Weekly CMO Review for LockN Labs + OneSun Strategies.

Analyze: 1) Brand positioning & differentiation 2) Service offerings (LockN Ship hackathon slots, OneSun Strategies advisory, LockN Labs sprints) with pricing recommendations 3) Go-to-market: landing page, waitlist funnel, content marketing, social 4) Competitive intel via web search 5) Revenue pipeline: fastest path to first paying customer from $0 to $500/mo target.

Output: Executive summary with 5 prioritized recommendations with revenue impact and timeline.

Post to Slack DM D0AC46HCRNZ.

Weekly CFO Review for OneSun Labs LLC (DBAs: LockN Labs, OneSun Strategies).

Analyze: 1) Cost structure (OpenAI Pro $200/mo, Claude Max $200/mo, Ollama Pro $20/mo, hardware amortization ~$8K server) 2) Revenue analysis per offering (LockN Ship, OneSun Advisory, LockN Sprint) with break-even 3) Subscription ROI (usage vs capacity for each) 4) Cash flow projections (3mo and 6mo) 5) Top 3 cost optimizations + top 3 revenue acceleration moves 6) LockN Swap (XRPL atomic arbitrage) + LockN Swing (XRPL triangle swing trading) — capital deployment status, trading P&L if live (both strategies), infrastructure costs, risk exposure, and ROI vs projections. If not yet live, track development costs and projected launch capital requirements.

Output: Executive financial summary with actionable recommendations.

Post to Slack DM D0AC46HCRNZ.
